content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the web_search command to find travel information for Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The command returned websites like US News Travel, Time Out, and Lonely Planet. I then used the browse_website command to gather more specific information on the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in those locations. While Lonely Planet featured articles on these destinations, there was no specific information on the best attractions or activities. I then used the google command to search for the "best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland." The command returned several websites including Four Seasons, Aman, and Ritz Carlton.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "xdg-open https://www.lonelyplanet.com/ https://www.fourseasons.com/ https://www.aman.com/ https://www.fairmont.com/copley-plaza-boston/ https://www.loewshotels.com/destinations https://www.ritzcarlton.com/ https://www.warwickhotels.com/warwick-destinations https://www.travelandleisure.com/trip-ideas/best-places-to-travel-in-2022"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_shell returned: Error: This Shell Command is not allowed.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.lonelyplanet.com/", "question": "What are the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: a travel website featuring articles and guides on various destinations and travel interests, including Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. The website offers practical tips, activity suggestions, and accommodation recommendations for travelers. It also features a section on the best destinations and experiences for 2023, as well as travel news and stories.\n\nLinks: ['Check out our trending guides (https://shop.lonelyplanet.com/collections/trending-destinations)', ' (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/)', 'Sign In (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/api/auth/login)', ' Saved lists (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile)', ' eLibrary (https://www.lonelyplanet.com/profile/library)']", type='action_result')]
"""
